changeSet.author: JocLRojas
changeSet.sql: UPDATE public.utm_logstash_filter SET filter_version='2.0.0', logstash_filter='# Generic filter, version 2.0 # Allow processing of any one line json or syslog logs pipeline: - dataTypes: - generic steps: - grok: patterns: - field_name: log.message pattern: ''(.*)'' source: raw - json: source: log.message' WHERE id=1521;
